name: Muc-Off Tubeless Presta Valves
description: Pick a colour, and go tubeless. This kit fits a wide range of MTB and road wheelsets.Constructed with precision-machined 6061 aluminum.Easy to install by hand, and remove with an 11mm spanner and 4mm hex.Removable core makes it easy to add sealant, with included core cap tool.Compatible with most tubeless-ready MTB and road wheelsets and tires.Included: valve, lock ring, O-ring, cap, and 3 sizes of rubber fit sleeves.Rim height: up to 30mm.Sold in pairs.
